node.title: Experiencing the Battle Between Good and Evil at a Rave
node.description: David Steward grew up in the church, but never took religion seriously.   He tried to seek for happiness in the world.  Attending hosting parties, he lived a life for self until he realized that happiness can only be found in God.  Ironically, this realization came after he attended a rave where he witnessed the battle between good and evil firsthand.  That experience changed his perspective forever taught him that life without God is just not worth it.
